title: Proposed bus upgrades in Macedon Ranges
articleContent:
Proposed upgrades would see three distinct bus routes in the Macedon Ranges:

  • Romsey to Kyneton
  • Lancefield to Sunbury
  • Lancefield to Gisborne

Download fact sheets about the proposed upgrades:

Download Macedon Ranges fact sheet(PDF)681 KB

Download Macedon Ranges fact sheet - accessible version(DOCX)216 KB
